issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
After clicking "Publish status with GRAPH API" message "no text to publish!!" appears.

Steps:
1.Launch KitchenSink.
2.Go to Mashups> Publish Stream.
3.Press on "Publish status with GRAPH API".

Expected results:
Alert :success. Log into facebook account : look for appcelerator logo posted 
which says <times> ago via Titanium Appcelerator.

Actual results:
Message "no text to publish" OK."
fields.summary: iOS: After clicking "Publish status with GRAPH API" error message appears. (iOS6).
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120918170114
Devices:
iPhone 4S -iOS6, iPad2, iPad3 -iOS6.

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
